content:
I was just playing around with the dataverse-people app and quickly realized I'm dead in the water on my Mac M2 laptop because Payara doesn't have multi-arch builds on Docker Hub: https://github.com/payara/Payara/issues/5715

I switched to gdcc/base:unstable which does have the arm64 support I need. :tada:

I'm wondering, should we comment on that Payara issue with how we are doing these builds? There seems to be a need.

These seem to be the relevant links:

  • https://guides.dataverse.org/en/5.13/container/base-image.html#processor-architecture-and-multiarch
  • https://github.com/IQSS/dataverse/blob/v5.13/.github/workflows/container_base_push.yml#L78
I think this is working flawless now, resolving :smile:
Ok but I'm still wondering if I should comment on that issue to show Payara folks what we're doing. What do you think?
Ok, I'll try to leave a comment sometime. I still think Payara should support M1/M2/arm64 Docker images.
